TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProcessHostSupportFunctions

Docs.summary: Provides helper functions for the process host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IProcessHostSupportFunctions is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](../../add/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](../Topic/.NET%20Framework%20Versions%20and%20Dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAppHostConfigFilename() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the application host configuration (.config) file path.
Docs.returns: The physical path (including the file name) to the application host configuration file.
Docs.value: The physical path (including the file name) to the application host configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetApplicationProperties (string appId, out string virtualPath, out string physicalPath, out string siteName, out string siteId);

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int GetConfigToken(string appId) cil managed

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the application.
Docs.summary: Gets a Windows security token for the specified application's root directory.
Docs.returns: A Windows handle that contains a Windows security token for the specified application's root directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetConfigToken is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](../../add/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](../Topic/.NET%20Framework%20Versions%20and%20Dependencies.md).

Docs.value: A Windows handle that contains a Windows security token for the specified application's root directory.
